rows.label: tlk44400084_02_msg0001
rows.name:
I hear we're finally warming to the idea
of trade with the outside. I'm glad. I
won't have to come here any more.

rows.label: tlk44400084_02_msg0002
rows.name:
I always feel utterly freezing, not being
able to get a decent meal around here.
This is the only place I can warm up.

rows.label: tlk44400084_02_msg0003
rows.name:
The water here is heated
internally, from within the
Divine Beast, so it's always warm.

rows.label: tlk44400084_02_msg0004
rows.name:
That water is spread throughout the
kingdom. That's why you won't see
any snow in town. It'd just melt.
